title: The roundabout on Porters Neck Road has become an eyesore.  The grassy center is not maintained, and two of the four directional signs have been knocked down by a vehicle plowing through, instead of around, the structure.  Who\'s in charge here, NH county or the state?  And why isn\'t anything being done about this mess?
